MainWindow.messageNonAppleFSWarningMac: Mod read-only: am detectat fisiere de sister non-Apple (%1). Ati mutat aplicatia in /Applications ?
MainWindow.messageFanControlMessage: In order to control fans Macs Fan Control requires to set elevated rights for its helper tool.
MainWindow.messageFanControlNotAvailable:
Macs Fan Control could not connect to the helper app to enable fan control as well as adjust the speeds. 

Make sure to enter an administrator password when asked.

For more information, please contact us at 
https://www.crystalidea.com/contact
MainWindow.messageNoFansDetected: No fans detected on this computer

FanControlDialog.title: Controlul ventilatorului pentru %1 fan
FanControlDialog.staticIncrease: Temperatura de la care viteza \nventilatorul va incepe sa creasca:
FanControlDialog.statusWarning:
Ceva nu e bine - valorile min/max sunt egale (%1).
Va rugam sa va asigurati ca ati dezintalat alte programe de control a ventilatoarelor si ca ati resetat SMC-ul.

PreferencesWindow.title: Preferinte
PreferencesWindow.tabTrayIconMac: Afiseaza ca icon in bara de meniu
PreferencesWindow.checkPrecise: Afisare cu precise a temperature daca este posibil (ex. 45.4)
PreferencesWindow.checkTwoLines: Display fan/sensor readings in two lines to save some space
PreferencesWindow.copyInfoMessage: Informatiile tehnice sunt copiate in clipboard

AboutDialog.title: Despre Macs Fan Control
AboutDialog.staticWarning: ACEST PROGRAM ESTE PENTRU UTILIZATORII AVANSATI CARE STIU SA-L FOLOSEASCA FARA A-SI STRICA MAC-UL. AUTORII NU POT FI RASPUNZATORI PENTRU PIERDEREA DATELOR, DEFECTIUNI, PIERDERI DE BANI SAU ALTE TIPURI DE PIERDERI RAPORTATE LA FOLOSIREA SAU NEFOLOSIREA ACESTUI PROGRAM.

NewVersionDialog.title: Macs Fan Control - O noua versiune este disponibila
NewVersionDialog.staticNewVersion: O noua version a acestui program este disponibila. Va rugam sa vizitati eite-ul pentru a obtine cea mai noua versiune.

RateMeDialog.informativeText: If you enjoy using %1, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? It won't take more than a minute. Thanks for your support!
RateMeDialog.checkDontShowAgain: Do not show this message again

UpdateChecker.NewVersionAvailable: A new version of %1 is available!
UpdateChecker.NewVersionAvailableText: %1 %2 is now available - you have %3. Would you like to download it now?
UpdateChecker.MessageNoUpdateAvailableDescription: %1 %2 is currently the newest version available.
UpdateChecker.MessageErrorConnect: An error occurred while downloading the update. Please try again later.
UpdateChecker.MessageErrorParse: An error occurred while parsing the update feed.

LetsMoveMac.kStrMoveApplicationCouldNotMove: Could not move to Applications folder

LetsMoveMac.kStrMoveApplicationQuestionInfoInDownloa: This will keep your Downloads folder uncluttered.
